movie.plot: A cover-up that spanned four U.S. Presidents pushed the country's first female newspaper publisher and a hard-driving editor to join an unprecedented battle between the press and the government.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 19 wins & 111 nominations.

events.title: the New York Times prints the first of their articles about the leaked Pentagon Papers
the High Court sides with the New York Times
